name: Back to Street Of Rage Game.exe && SourceCode
name_original: Back to Street Of Rage Game.exe && SourceCode
description:
·This is a 1980's Style Beat Em' Up Fighting Game I Have Made With Unity for Two Months Weekends.

·The Sprite Souce Were all from Google Pictrue and then Cut Out the background with PhotoShop ,Created Animations, Animator State,Combat System in Unity3D Enging.

·The Following Unityprojectpackage of this game included four playerable levelstages,two controllable main characters,four different Bosses character AI and Enemies AI .

Now I have released this Demo for Free on itch.io, but the UnityPackage and the source code is completely open for 0.5$ ,if you are  a beginner working on making game with Unity Engine,  you can  also get your reference   from "BackToStreetOfRage_UnityPackge" to make your  own beat em' up Style  fighting game.

download and enjoy it,and Support Me ,Thank you all!

PS: If you download The UnityPackageFile, the following Documentation File can help you to set the Collision Layer Matrix and Build Scenes Correctly. 

Support Me On Patreon :
